displayName: Do you want users to be able to access the user interface outside of your network? (Yes, No)
Do you have an IDP (Identity Provider) that supports SAML 2.0? (Yes, No)
Where will the PFPT AD security groups be maintained? (On prem deployments require universal groups containing all users that need to log in, in the resource forest.)
Service provider or IDP (Identity Provider) initiated? (We only support Service Provider initiated)
Do you require request encryption? (We don't support it.) (Yes, No)
Do you require response signing? (We support it.) (Yes, No)
Do you require response encryption? (We support it.) (Yes, No)
If the response is to be encrypted, do you require a 3rd party cert or is a self-signed cert sufficient? (We support both.) (Yes, No)
What attribute will you be sending as part of the response? (We only support UPN, email, and SID.)
Do you intend to deploy PFPT's remote authentication? (Yes, No)
Are all user accounts on trusted forests? (Yes, No)
Are all domain controllers accessible on the same network as the server that Remote Auth will be installed? (Yes, No)
